attributes.additional_details: Our aim is to legalise marijuana this is because there are so so many benefits to it that people don’t know about or think. It is good for your mental health it helps you feel relaxed and not stressed. It can help cure many cancerous diseases. It makes people with eating disorders feel like eating and drinking. It can make you so much happier so it helps with depression also. It is already legal in other countries so why should it be illegal in ours. Please help make a change and make peoples lives better.
attributes.background: We want the government to legalise marijuana because many people could benefit massively from it. It can help pains go away, anxiety, depression and many many more things.
